summary: fixes the weird jumping around the beginning cart does when you have a modded game
descriptionHtml:
this mod fixes the weird jumping around that the prisoner cart does when ever you select new game in skyrim with a modded or heavily modded game,this mod is inspired by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46703/?][i]Cart Carriage Havok Patch for SOS and other Mods by [b]UniqueOne[/b][/i][/url] here on the nexus his deals with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38529/?]Touring Carriages by [b]DayDreamer[/b][/url] also here on the nexus. [b]While mine is just for the beginning sequence[/b] that the player is travelling in a prisoner cart to helgen, this does not fix anything else but that which i stated above.

i have tried this fix on 5 new games and it worked every time with some small glitches that does fix its self
the front horse and cart will bounce around some, but straightened its self out.

[b]this mod only uses  one original Skyrim mesh[/b]
author: kaliban71
